name: Navigate_To_Page

type.description: A string that identifies the type of page to navigate to, which determines the URL format and necessary attributes.

attributes.description: A map of name-value pairs that specify the details of the target page, dependent on the page type.

state.description: Optional key-value pairs with string keys and values that can conditionally customize content within a page. This parameter supports a standard set of properties depending on the page type.
